name: wasp-hls
description: WebAssembly HLS Player Proof Of Concept

scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run build:wasm && npm run build:worker && npm run build:main
scripts.build:all:demo: npm run clean && npm run build:wasm && npm run build:worker && npm run build:demo
scripts.build:release: npm run clean && npm run build:wasm:release && npm run build:worker:release && npm run build:main:release
scripts.build:wasm: npm run compile:rs && npm run move:wasm
scripts.build:wasm:release: npm run compile:rs:release && npm run move:wasm && node scripts/wasm-strip.js build/wasp_hls_bg.wasm
scripts.check: npm run types && npm run lint
scripts.check:demo: npm run types:demo && npm run lint:demo
scripts.check:main: npm run types:main && npm run lint:main
scripts.check:worker: npm run types:worker && npm run lint:worker && npm run lint:transmux
scripts.fmt: npm run fmtr && npm run fmtt
scripts.lint: npm run lint:main && npm run lint:worker && npm run lint:transmux && npm run lint:common && npm run lint:demo
scripts.types: npm run types:main && npm run types:worker && npm run types:demo

author: peaberberian
